alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 5:44PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Churchill County through 615 PM PDT... At 544 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fallon, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fallon, Fallon Municipal Airport, Junction U.S 50 And NV 116 (Stuart Rd) and Fallon Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
